citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany an APHIS Official during the inspection process at 1:09pm on
November 7, 2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by speaking with a family member on the premises
and waited 30 minutes. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation
of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany an APHIS Official during the inspection process at 1:09pm on 
November 7, 2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by speaking with a family member on the premises 
and waited 30 minutes. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation 
of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
